name: Meme Party
description:
A easy to learn but hard to master minimalist game with simple one button controls for Windows. Local multiplayer support for up to 2 players, and additional support for up to 998 AIs (impractical) with various personalities.

Features
  • Minimalist graphics and gameplay
  • Up to 1000 player support, 2 human players
  • Single button controls
  • Simple, intuitive gameplay
  • Local multiplayer
  • Tons of bonuses
  • 10 AIs of varying intelligence
